info.name: 1337x.to-dark v21.04
info.description: Special thanks to p2pFreak (https://userstyles.org/styles/154365/1337x-dark-proper-no-bs) for catching some things I missed!
info.additionalInfo:
03/30/2021 removed the annoying stream torrent link, added missing .gd domain

06/21/2019 website actually randomized classnames, this update should fix the white background
I tried to get rid of the VPN links and the stream now and anonymous download ones, but they can be at various positions and accounting for all possibilities can hide everything from torrent download, description box to infohash (you can uncomment the box at the bottom if you want to give it a try. this is based upon a sample size of about 4 dozen pages, you might have to add additional nth-child numbers)
